author: iSazonov
body:
It is related #5783 

```
# Add-Type works
E:\PowerShell\src\powershell-win-core\bin\Debug\netcoreapp2.0\win7-x64\publish\pwsh.exe

# Add-Type doesn't work
E:\PowerShell\src\powershell-win-core\bin\Debug\netcoreapp2.0\win7-x64\pwsh.exe
```
One of the reasons is the lack of `ref` folder.
`Add-Type` should fail gracefully when `ref` folder cannot be found.
title: Add-Type doesn't work from the parent folder of 'publish'
